delete_account_data: All of the data contributed to Open Assistant by solving tasks, ranking messages, and any conversations had using the chat service, will be retained. However, all references to the original user are anonymized.
delete_account_intro: Deleting an account entails the following:
delete_account_leaderboard: Accounts of deleted users won't show up on the leaderboards
delete_account_permanent: This action is permanent and cannot be undone
